text.value: Were you stationed at the office Since March 2019?
Are you aware of that training?

We conducted training on the use of digital technology(Afyadata) for Community Health Workers to detect and reports Health events for Human and Animal at community level (Malinyi Juni, 2019, Mvomero April 2019,Gairo July-August 2019). REMEMBER TO PROBE FOR ANOTHER PERSON IF "NO"
B. Participatory community-based surveillance: Strongly agree(1), Agree(2), Neither agree Nor disagree (Neutral)(3), Disagree (4), Strongly disagree(5)
1. Deployment of AfyaData in your area has enhanced working across animal and human sectors to fight epidemics in human and animal populations
Strongly agree(1), Agree(2), Neither agree Nor disagree (Neutral)(3), Disagree (4), Strongly disagree(5)
2. Deployment of AfyaData has complemented participatory engagement of local communities disease surveillance
Strongly agree(1), Agree(2), Neither agree Nor disagree (Neutral)(3), Disagree (4), Strongly disagree(5)
3. Deployment of AfyaData has enhanced early disease and events detection and response at the community level
Strongly agree(1), Agree(2), Neither agree Nor disagree (Neutral)(3), Disagree (4), Strongly disagree(5)
4. Deployment of AfyaData has enhanced early response to health events
Strongly agree(1), Agree(2), Neither agree Nor disagree (Neutral)(3), Disagree (4), Strongly disagree(5)
5. Training and empowering CHRs with digital technology was a good strategy towards community-level One Health security
Strongly agree(1), Agree(2), Neither agree Nor disagree (Neutral)(3), Disagree (4), Strongly disagree(5)
6. WhatsApp-supported social network has been useful to share experience, challenges and solutions
Strongly agree(1), Agree(2), Neither agree Nor disagree (Neutral)(3), Disagree (4), Strongly disagree(5)
7. DMO, CHW-coordinator and Health facility: Have you ever experienced any disease outbreak in humans in your area over the past 12 months?
8. If yes to Qn. 7, could you describe the last outbreak (probe on average timelines if respondent cannot recall exactly)
8.2 Estimate of the number of cases
Damu kutoka puani/mdomoni/masikioni/machoni/sehemu za haja ndogo na kubwa
Kuvimba tezi maeneo ya shingo, makwapa, mapaja
Kutokwa na machozi/kuvimba macho/macho kuwa mekundu
Manjano kwenye sehemu nyeupe ya macho/ngozi
Ngozi ikiﬁnywa/ kubonyezwa inarudi polepole sana
8.4 No. of days between onset of outbreak and detection
8.5 No. of days between onset of outbreak and notification to higher level
8.6 No. days between outbreak onset and verification
8.7 No. days between verification and laboratory confirmation
8.8 No. days between outbreak onset and intervention
8.9 No. days between outbreak onset and public communication
8.10 No. days between outbreak onset and outbreak end
9. DVO and LFO: Have you ever experienced any disease outbreak in animals in your area over the past 12 months?
10. If yes to Qn. 9, could you describe the outbreaks (probe on average timelines if respondent cannot recall exactly)
10.2 Estimate of the number of cases
Damu isiyoganda kutoka puani/mdomoni/masikioni/sehemu za haja ndogo/kubwa
10.4 No. of days between onset of outbreak and detection
10.5 No. of days between onset of outbreak and notification to higher level
10.6 No. days between outbreak onset and verification
10.7 No. days between verification and laboratory confirmation
10.8 No. days between outbreak onset and intervention
10.9 No. days between outbreak onset and public communication
10.10 No. days between outbreak onset and outbreak end
11 Have you ever notify higher level?
11.1 How have you been notifying higher level authority on disease and other health events?
Sending out report through public transport
Other mechanism of notifying higher level authority on disease and other health events
